data.author: vtalpaert
data.message:
Update ardrone_sdk dependencies

Found in https://build.ros2.org/job/Rbin_uN64__ardrone_sdk__ubuntu_noble_amd64__binary/5/console that dependencies are missing for the release. They are listed at https://github.com/vtalpaert/ardrone-sdk-native/blob/main/README.md#solving-dependencies
